name: threejs-viewer
description: Experiments with using three.js as a object viewer

scripts.start: run-p assemble-gltfloader1 copy-models copy-draco parcel-dev watch --silent
scripts.build: run-s clean assemble-gltfloader1 copy-models copy-draco parcel-build --silent
scripts.assemble-gltfloader1: echo Assembling glTF v.1 loader ... && concat -o js/GLTFLoader1/GLTFLoader1.js js/GLTFLoader1/GLTFLoader1-prepend.js node_modules/three-v86/examples/js/loaders/GLTFLoader.js js/GLTFLoader1/GLTFLoader1-append.js && echo done.
scripts.copy-models: echo Copying model files from /models to /dist/models ... && copyfiles --error models/**/* dist && echo done.
scripts.copy-draco: echo Copying draco files from /node_modules/three/examples/js/libs/draco to /dist/draco ... && copyfiles -f --error node_modules/three/examples/js/libs/draco/**/* dist/draco && echo done.
scripts.jsfix: standard js/*.js --fix --verbose | snazzy || exit 0 && echo Standard did not find any javascript issues to fix
